scripts.migrate: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.migrate:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.reset: npm run rollback && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.rollback: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex migrate:rollback --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.seed: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex seed:run --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.seed:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex seed:run --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.seed:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex seed:run --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.seed:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 npx knex seed:run --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.test:solution: docker-compose build && docker-compose run --rm api npm test && docker-compose down
scripts.db:reset:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run
scripts.db:reset:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:rollback --all && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run
scripts.db:reset:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex seed:run
